metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: With PHP, you can connect to and manipulate databases.
content.html: With PHP, you can connect to and manipulate databases.

content.text: MySQL is the most popular database system used with PHP.
content.html: MySQL is the most popular database system used with PHP.

content.text: The data in a MySQL database are stored in tables. A table is a collection of related data, and it consists of columns and rows.
content.html: The data in a MySQL database are stored in tables. A table is a collection of related data, and it consists of columns and rows.

content.text: Databases are useful for storing information categorically. A company may have a database with the following tables:
content.html: Databases are useful for storing information categorically. A company may have a database with the following tables:

content.text: A query is a question or a request.
content.html: A query is a question or a request.

content.text: We can query a database for specific information and have a recordset returned.
content.html: We can query a database for specific information and have a recordset returned.

content.text: Look at the following query (using standard SQL):
content.html: Look at the following query (using standard SQL):

content.code_html: SELECT LastName FROM Employees

content.text: The query above selects all the data in the "LastName" column from the "Employees" table.
content.html: The query above selects all the data in the "LastName" column from the "Employees" table.

content.text: To learn more about SQL, please visit our SQL tutorial .
content.html: To learn more about SQL, please visit our SQL tutorial.

content.text: If you don't have a PHP server with a MySQL Database, you can download it for free here: http://www.mysql.com
content.html: If you don't have a PHP server with a MySQL Database, you can download it for free here: http://www.mysql.com

content.text: MySQL is the de-facto standard database system for web sites with HUGE volumes of both data and end-users (like Facebook, Twitter, and Wikipedia).
content.html: MySQL is the de-facto standard database system for web sites with HUGE volumes of both data and end-users (like Facebook, Twitter, and Wikipedia).

content.text: Another great thing about MySQL is that it can be scaled down to support embedded database applications.
content.html: Another great thing about MySQL is that it can be scaled down to support embedded database applications.

content.text: Look at http://www.mysql.com/customers/ for an overview of companies using MySQL.
content.html: Look at http://www.mysql.com/customers/ for an overview of companies using MySQL.
